subject: The Skinny: Monday April 30, 2007
body:

Obama's Preacher And 
      Clinton's Pollster 
The New York Times examines Barack Obama's faith, including his 
      relationship with a controversial Chicago pastor. 
And the Washington Post profiles Hillary Clinton's top campaign strategist. 
Joel Roberts has the highlights of the day's headlines.  More...

Joel Robertstheskinny@cbs.com
